content:
I didn't mention the water buckets again in this response. To incorporate the fact, I could rephrase the initial sentence to:

"I'm glad I got those new water buckets in time for the farm open house event, they're making a big difference in our daily operations. By the way, I was thinking of organizing a farm open house event to invite the local community to come and see our operations. Do you have any tips on how to plan and host a successful farm open house event?"
